property.name: FileName
property.descrip: The name of the next file to be written to a TAR archive.

property.name: FileSize
property.descrip: The size of the next file to be written to a TAR archive.

property.name: IsDirectory
property.descrip: If _TRUE_, then the next file to be written to the TAR archive is a directory entry.

property.name: Skip
property.descrip: Set to _TRUE_ to skip this file from being written to the TAR archive.
